  • Lakeway Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Our Goal is to Close All Loans in 28 Days or Less
  • Local underwriting, processing and closing for fast approval & on time fundings

  • Local moonlight Customer Service

Lakeway, TX Mortgage Lenders

If you are shopping for a home or mortgage in Lakeway, TX, Lone Star Financing is located right around the corner and can help with your next home loan.  We offer local customer service,  whether you are seeking an FHA loan, USDA loan, VA loan or mortgage refinance. We make the process of applying for a home loan in Lakeway, TX quick and easy and offer same-day approvals. Lone Star Financing is rated first for Lakeway, TX Mortgage Lenders by local Realtors (Rave Realty). Make your goal of becoming a homeowner a reality, our dedicated team of specialists can help you choose the right loan just for you.  Mortgage Lending in Lakeway, TX is simple and convenient with your local Lakeway, TX Mortgage Lenders. Call us today to get the best mortgage rates on your Lakeway, TX home loan.

  • Direct Mortgage Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate
  • Local Lakeway customer service


Lone Star Financing – Your Lakeway, TX mortgage lender for new home purchases. 

Lakeway, TX Real Estate Market (2022)

Lakeway, TX Real Estate Snapshot – Lakeway, TX is located in Travis County, 12 miles west of Austin, TX on the shores of Lake Travis.  The real estate market continues to be hot in the Austin area as of June, 2022.  The average cost per home in Lakeway is $953,789. There are currently 412 resale and new homes for sale in Lakeway on Trulia, including 7 open houses, as well as 9 homes in foreclosure process. 

Shon Lorg, Austin realtor, said “As a local realtor, I think Lone Star are the best mortgage lenders in Lakeway. I have been working with Lone Star Financing for the past several years. As a real estate we care about one thing, and that is Closing on Time! They are right around the corner in Riverplace and having a local mortgage company is imperative to communication and closings. I constantly choose Lone Star because of their location, communication and commitment to closing on time. I would highly recommend Lone Star Financing (and staff) for your next home loan” Shon Lorg, Rave Realty of Lakeway. 

Your Lakeway mortgage lender serving 78669, 78734, 78738 and surrounding areas.
